text: The IFMA World Muaythai Championships are annual amateur muaythai competitions organised by the International Federation of Muaythai Amateur (IFMA), which is the sport governing body. Alongside the World Games muaythai programme, it is the highest level of competition for the sport. ==Individual events== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" !rowspan=3
